title: HP Layoffs: Company to cut 10% of its staff amounting to 6000 employees globally
description: HP Inc. announced on Tuesday that it plans to slash 4,000 to 6,000 jobs worldwide by fiscal 2028, Reuters reported. The move is part of the company’s effort to streamline operations, adopt artificial intelligence, increase product development, improve customer service, and boost productivity. | financialexpress.com

title: AI music platform Suno and Warner sign deal to compensate artists
description: The U.S. artificial intelligence platform Suno and Warner Music Group on Tuesday announced a partnership to compensate recording artists in the fast-growing domain of AI music.

title: Responsible AI: Why it matters now and how to build it right
description: Artificial intelligence should not be about reducing headcount, but used as a force multiplier.
content: Across industries, leaders are racing to automate. Yet every day, we’re reminded that technology alone can’t think critically, empathize, or make moral judgments. In security—and in business more broadly—it’s tempting to embrace AI for its efficiency... [4307 chars]

title: HP to slash up to 6,000 jobs - latest tech company to pivot to AI
description: HP said Tuesday it expects to cut between 4,000 and 6,000 jobs globally by fiscal 2028 as part of a plan to streamline operations and adopt artificial intelligence to speed up product development, improve customer satisfaction and boost productivity.

description: As artificial intelligence companies prepare to pour money into the midterm elections, some in the A.I. world are hatching plans of their own to curb the industry’s influence.

title: Alphabet on pace to hit $4 trillion market value as AI gains momentum
description: (Reuters) -Alphabet was on track to hit a historic $4 trillion market valuation on Tuesday, powered by an impressive year-long rally fueled by the Google parent's sharpened focus on artificial intelligence tools.
